name: Posterize Me! HD
description:
"Posterize Me!" creates cool artistic posters with the touch of a finger.

Give your photos Poster and Art effects Warhol style or create your own personal style or touch.

Either way, you'll create an awesome poster every time.

Features:
- Straightforward and streamlined interface.
- Toggle between B&W and Color to add or highlight beautiful effects.
- Choose from a selection of paper textured backgrounds.
- Adjust the posterization, background or color to fine-tune the effect.

Once you've created your Poster, you can also pick from a wide selection of Brush Strokes to artistically paint your Poster, for that perfect custom touch.

Have fun turning yourself and friends into an awesome Poster!

- All screenshots were created with this app.
